tool_description: An API showing latest news on Climate change
name: Climate Change News Media
title: Climate Change News Media

api_list.name: Get News from Specified Source
api_list.description: This endpoint will get the news from the specified newspaper name only.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-change-news-media.p.rapidapi.com/news/thetimes"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-change-news-media.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-change-news-media.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newpaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-change-news-media.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: GET all Climate Change News
api_list.description: This endpoint will return news about climate change on popular website
